name: One Hour Before Quarantine
description:
The Goal :

deliver to anyone in need before times runs out, also remind them to stay safe at home and respect barrier gestures

Keys :

Arrows : move / drive
E      : take / throw box       
F      : enter / exit car
Tab  :  show map

How To Play :

- You can move using the arrows keys.- You can jump using 'space'.
- you can take the crates by pressing "E" if you are close enough to these.
- press "E" near to your truck, to load them inside and transport them.
- you can take them back by jumping inside.
- get into the truck by pressing "F" in front of the driver's door
- you drive the truck with the arrows keys
-there are 3 types of ressources
-open the map using "tab" to know the object to deliver and the delivery position.
-the blue arrow represent your position on the map.
-end your run by throwing the crates in the green area, it will disappear later if it is the right crate.

Stay Safe! Jam - Solidarity
